name: seekers: seeker of lights
description:
----------------------------------------------

I'ts 2192. Robots has taken over the world. Humanity had only two choice... Join them or die...  But of course there was a people who tried to fought against them... And we called them... [seekers]...

----------------------------------------------

move: WASD

interact with people or door: EEEEE

jump: space

aim&shoot: mouse and click

----------------------------------------------

credit:

music: Raphytator , soul knight,  skul: the hero slayer, starwars, undertale and mandalorian

art: first boss inspired by Devin  Amlen

---------------------------------------------

by the way, this is not an RPG game...
